aboutMyselfP1: Hi! My name is Kirill, I am currently a systems analyst and want to try myself as a frontend developer.
aboutMyselfP2: I have some experience in programming in Python (study projects on backend development and Data science).
aboutMyselfP3: I also have basic knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript, I know a little React.
aboutMyselfP4: I signed up for this course because I want to deepen my knowledge of React and learn more about frontend development.
aboutMyselfP5: I hope that the knowledge I gain will help me move to the position of a frontend developer, or at least write better technical specifications :)
